General.Name: Maniker F & G Co. Ltd
General.Description: Maniker F&G Co., Ltd. produces, processes, and sells frozen, chilled, and retorted food products. It offers a range of chicken and beef products for home and business use. The company also exports its products to the United States. Maniker F&G Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
